about_the_game:
Launch into the exciting universe of Pinball and get ready for a Pachinko fused experience filled with playful characters, ramps and bumpers. Choose between different characters and unleash their unique hero power such as time rewind and more! Aim with precision, time well and choose wisely. Flip your way through different realms, score big and experience the thrill of arcade fun. Get ready to flip out in FlipScapes!

Take off to different worlds and unique environments with this pachinko pinball mix. From underwater wonders to scorching deserts, to the vastness of outer space, you'll bounce, flip and slide! Choose carefully between different heroes with their unique powers!

Characters




Meet Callisto, a curious cutie who is always on the lookout for new places to explore.


Rage flip through the playfield with Tuhin, blow up!


The time-warping capabilities of Cronus are unmatched!


Discover the magic of flower power with Aspen and her overpowered ability.


Aukai has the ability to call upon his fish companions for assistance.

Even more characters will arrive during early access!

The mystical Genie will guide you on your pinball pachinko journey.

Key Features

  • Play characters with unique active and passive powers. Level up!
  • Discover multiple worlds with their own stories that you can explore with your chosen hero.
  • Original soundtrack and reactive music while playing.
  • Blast off to the celestial heights of the leaderboards!
  • Achievements such as "Win 5 level using only the left flipper" and "Ace Score" for levels.
  • Great on Steam Deck and full controller support.

Don't forget to check out the Downloadable Soundtrack!

Notes

  • This game uses Epic Online Services (EOS). You can play Offline if you want. However, playing Online enables cloud save, achievements & leaderboards.

name: FlipScapes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: RTX required for DLSS, fallback is FSR

short_description: Flip, bounce and roll through a Pinball Pachinko universe filled with playful characters. Pick your favorite hero and immerse yourself in arcade fun!
